DocumentRecipient.name: DocumentRecipient
DocumentRecipient.description: Connects a Service Report to a Digital Signature.

DigitalSignatureId.description: Digital Signature to be used on the Service Report.

DigitalSignatureUrl.description: Link to request signature from Experience Cloud site.

DocumentId.description: The document sent to the recipient.

DocumentRecipient.description: Number automatically assigned to a new record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object. ID of the creator of this object.

QuoteDocumentId.description: The quote document sent to the recipient.

RecipientId.description: The recipient to sign the document.

SignatureIdentifier.description: A unique identifier that associates DocumentRecipient with a signature Lightning web component (LWC) on the report page layout, telling you where on the report the signature goes.

SignatureStatus.description: The status of the signature. The default value is Completed. Possible values are: Completed Skipped

SignatureStatusReason.description: An explanation for the signature status. For example, a reason why the signature was skipped.

Status.description: The status of the document recipient record.
